klass.name: Introduction to the Writing of Verse
klass.note: This is an instructor-approved course, and enrollment is limited. To be considered for admission, you must submit a writing sample and an application form by 4:00 p.m., Tuesday, October 30; please read the course description in the "Announcement of Classes" on our website at english.berkeley.edu (select "courses") for details concerning the required writing sample and other information.

klass.name: Freshman and Sophomore Studies
klass.note: SATISFIES READING AND COMPOSITION REQUIREMENT; If you are planning to major in English and have taken R1A but have not yet taken R1B, you are eligible to take English R50, which is equivalent to R1B and is geared toward prospective English majors. The topics, book lists, and course descriptions for these classes can be found in our "Announcement of Classes" at english.berkeley.edu; select "courses."

klass.name: Honors Course
